explains: n. 拼布工艺（品）；拼凑之物
wordGroup: patchwork quilt 拼布床单；用小块布缝缀的被罩

sentences.en: For centuries, quilting and patchwork have been popular needlecrafts.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来，被褥绗缝和拼缝一直是流行的针线活。

sentences.en: There are several patchwork cushions to choose from.
sentences.cn: 有几种拼布工艺垫子可供选择。

sentences.en: From the plane, the landscape was just a patchwork of fields.
sentences.cn: 从飞机上俯瞰，满目是田园交错的景色。
